page.title: 17CULLOMPTON COMPREHENSIVE
page.content: The school was built in 1963 and has 625 pupils and 36 teachers.Subjects taught are English,Maths,the Sciences, French,German,Social Studies,Social Education,Art,Homecrafts,Metal and Woodwork,Technical Drawing,Computer Studies,P.E.,Games,Drama and Music. They have sports clubs,computer,music and drama clubs.They also have the use of the nearby sports hall during the day and have a small outdoor swimming pool.The children are between 11 and 16 years.They can take C.S.E. or 'O' level public exams before leaving. Those wanting further education usually go on to{Tiverton.} School trips go to European countries and they have an activities week in summer.They wear school uniform.Punishments range from detentions to exclusion from school.
